sponsors.name: NEAR Protocol
sponsors.description: NEAR is a blockchain platform designed for usability and scalability. They're looking for cross-chain privacy solutions, privacy-preserving AI, and private payment solutions using NEAR intents SDK.

bounties.description: Use the NEAR intents SDK and other NEAR solutions to connect Zcash with multiple chains and champion access to DeFi for Zcash users privately.
Use NEAR AI toolings to leverage verifiable & private TEE based inference to build Agentic models that allow users to spend their ZEC wisely, and privately.
Build Zcash related private real world payment solutions using NEAR intents and related technologies.

sponsors.name: Project Tachyon
sponsors.description: Project Tachyon is contributing $35,000 split evenly across all nine hackathon tracks. This support enables builders across every category to develop innovative privacy-preserving solutions on Zcash.

bounties.description: Build solutions that enable private cross-chain transactions and interoperability.
Develop AI applications and computation solutions that protect user privacy.
Create payment solutions that prioritize transaction privacy.
Build developer tools and infrastructure for privacy-preserving applications.
Innovate on wallet UX and self-custody solutions with privacy focus.
Build privacy-preserving DeFi protocols and trading solutions.
Create analytics tools that respect privacy while providing insights.
Produce content that educates about privacy technology.
Build innovative applications that push the boundaries of privacy tech.

sponsors.name: Starknet
sponsors.description: Starknet is a permissionless decentralized Layer 2 network. They're looking for creative privacy applications, developer tools, and wallet innovations built on Ztarknet.

bounties.description: Build innovative privacy applications including a 'Wildcard' submission ($20k), ZumpFun privacy-enabled launchpad ($5k), or Micropayments on Zashi Wallet ($1k).
Build developer tooling on top of existing Ztarknet implementation or cross-chain messaging between Starknet and Zcash.
Create a single wallet interface with multichain capabilities or build atomic swaps between Zec and Starknet.

sponsors.name: Network School
sponsors.description: Network School offers an all-inclusive package covering accommodation, food, coworking, gym, and events on a solarpunk island near Singapore. They're looking for zk-Passport and zk-Census solutions.

bounties.description: Looking for zk-Passport (privacy-preserving cryptoidentity solutions) and zk-Census (measuring population for startup societies without doxxing members).

sponsors.name: Mina Protocol
sponsors.description: Mina Protocol is the world's lightest blockchain. They're looking for cross-chain bridges, privacy infrastructure, wallet innovation, and educational content combining Mina and Zcash.

bounties.description: Build a privacy-preserving bridge between Zcash and Mina or cross-chain privacy solutions using Mina.
Build a privacy-first application framework using merkle trees, nullifiers, semaphore, etc.
Build a multi-chain privacy wallet supporting Mina and Zcash.
Create content explaining the cryptography behind Zcash and Mina (Pasta curves, verifiable privacy).

sponsors.name: Axelar Network
sponsors.description: Axelar delivers secure cross-chain communication. They're looking for cross-chain privacy solutions and privacy-preserving AI & computation.

bounties.description: Build innovative cross-chain privacy solutions that bridge multiple blockchain ecosystems while preserving user privacy.
Develop privacy-focused AI applications and computation solutions that protect user data while maintaining functionality.

sponsors.name: Arcium
sponsors.description: Arcium provides encrypted compute on Solana. They're looking for privacy-preserving DeFi applications including dark pools, private perpetuals, and private lending.

bounties.description: Build privacy-preserving DeFi applications using Arcium's encrypted compute. Includes Dark Pools ($3.5k), Private Perpetuals ($3.5k), and Private Lending ($3.5k).

sponsors.name: Aztec Labs
sponsors.description: Aztec is building the encrypted Ethereum. They're looking for private bridges, wallets, and DeFi solutions connecting Zcash and Aztec.

bounties.description: Build a bi-directional private bridge between Zcash and Aztec.
Build a smart contract wallet on Aztec compatible with both Zcash and Aztec.
Build a Zcash-backed stablecoin on Aztec with private yield generation.
Produce amazing content around the importance of privacy.

sponsors.name: Electric Coin Company
sponsors.description: ECC is the creator and steward of Zcash. They're looking for libraries enabling transparent-only Zcash users to send shielded outputs using the PCZT API.

bounties.description: Implement a library in TypeScript, Go, Kotlin, or Java that enables transparent-only Zcash users to send shielded outputs using the PCZT API.

sponsors.name: Osmosis
sponsors.description: Osmosis is the leading cross-chain AMM. They're looking for cross-chain privacy solutions, wallet innovation, private payments, and privacy content.

bounties.description: Build cross-chain privacy solutions that integrate Zcash with other blockchain ecosystems.
Create innovative wallet solutions and self-custody tools that enhance privacy and user experience.
Develop payment solutions and transaction systems that prioritize privacy and security.
Create content that educates, entertains, or inspires around privacy technology.

sponsors.name: Miden
sponsors.description: Polygon Miden is a ZK rollup for private, high-throughput applications. They're looking for private bridges and wallet integration between Zcash and Miden.

bounties.description: Build a private bridge between Zcash testnet and Miden testnet.
Integrate Zcash into Miden's WebSDK and the Miden Browser Wallet.

sponsors.name: Fhenix
sponsors.description: Fhenix enables Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) on blockchain. They're looking for FHE-based DeFi, analytics, infrastructure, wallets, and creative applications.

bounties.description: Build privacy-preserving DeFi applications using FHE.
Use FHE to create private aggregated analytics and oracles for Zcash data.
Use FHE to generate proof of innocence and build privacy infrastructure tools.
Create innovative wallet solutions using FHE technology.
Composability experiments - build creative privacy-preserving applications combining multiple technologies.

sponsors.name: Helius
sponsors.description: Helius provides Solana's leading RPC and APIs. They're looking for Solana-Zcash cross-chain privacy solutions.

bounties.description: Build Solana to Zec focused solutions that enable cross-chain privacy and interoperability.

sponsors.name: Zcash Community Grants
sponsors.description: Zcash Community Grants funds projects that benefit the Zcash ecosystem. They're looking for unstoppable private DeFi and Zcash core tooling.

bounties.description: Build unstoppable private DeFi solutions that prioritize user privacy and security.
Build software and tooling around Zcash core.

sponsors.name: Nillion
sponsors.description: Nillion enables private computation through nilAI (private LLMs), nilCC (confidential compute), and nilDB (private storage).

bounties.description: Build a privacy-preserving AI app with nilAI and/or nilCC.
Build a privacy-preserving data and analytics platform using nilCC and/or nilDB.

sponsors.name: Unstoppable Wallet
sponsors.description: Unstoppable is a non-custodial multi-currency wallet. They're looking for next-generation wallet experiences and private DeFi integrations.

bounties.description: Build next-generation wallet experiences, enhanced privacy UX, mobile-first self-custody solutions.
Focus on private swaps, launchpads, privacy-preserving analytics, and integrating privacy into swap flows.

sponsors.name: Pump Fun
sponsors.description: Pump.fun is a Solana token launchpad. They're looking for Solana-Zcash cross-chain privacy solutions.

bounties.description: Build Solana to Zcash focused solutions that enable cross-chain privacy and interoperability.

sponsors.name: Gemini
sponsors.description: Gemini is a regulated cryptocurrency exchange. They're looking for an advanced Zcash block explorer with client-side viewing key decryption.

bounties.description: Build an advanced Zcash block explorer that allows users to view their shielded transactions using viewing keys entirely client-side.

sponsors.name: Bitlux
sponsors.description: Bitlux enables private crypto payments. They're looking for content that normalizes privacy and cross-chain payment solutions.

bounties.description: Create content that normalizes privacy and educates about the importance of financial privacy.
Develop payment systems that facilitate organized and methodical payment receipt and issuance in a private manner.

sponsors.name: RayBot
sponsors.description: RayBot provides crypto trading tools. They're looking for Zcash data analytics and developer tools.

bounties.description: Build applications that enable analysis of Zcash-related data, creating meaningful insights.
Create tools that make it easier for developers to build privacy-preserving applications.

sponsors.name: Noah by Plena Finance
sponsors.description: Noah by Plena Finance provides DeFi solutions. They're looking for privacy-focused DeFi apps using Noah and MagicBlocks.

bounties.description: Use Noah to create privacy focused DeFi or trading apps with MagicBlocks integration.

sponsors.name: Star
sponsors.description: Star hosts The Shot, a live onchain shark tank. They're looking for innovative private payment solutions.

bounties.description: Build innovative private payment solutions on Zcash. The most unique application gets a chance to pitch investors on The Shot.

sponsors.name: Mintlify
sponsors.description: Mintlify provides beautiful developer documentation. One category winner receives their Pro plan for a year.

bounties.description: One category winner receives developer documentation with everything available on Mintlify's Pro plan for a year.

sponsors.name: Alliance DAO
sponsors.description: Alliance is the leading crypto accelerator, providing funding and mentorship to top crypto startups.
